COMMITTEE ON SCIENTIFIC AIDS TO LEARNING
COMMITTEE OF NATIONAL RESEARCH COUNCIL
41 EAST 42ND STREET, NEW YORK, N.Y.
Telephone: Murray Hill 2-8352
James B. Conant, Chairman
Vannevar Bush
Ross G. Harrison
Frank B. Jewett
Bethuel M. Webster
Ben D. Wood
August 21, 1940
Irvin Stewart, Director
Mr. Frank E. Sohooley
University of Illinois
Radio Station WILL
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Mr. Schooleys
This will acknowledge with appreciation
your letter to Dr. Stewart of August 16 inviting him to
attend the 1940 Annual Convention 6f the NAEB to be held
September 6 and 7 in Chicago, Illinois. Dr. Stewart is
spending practically all of his time in Washington as
Secretary of the National Defense Research Committee and
will not be able to take advantage of your invitation, as
much as he would like to do so.
Sincerely yours.
Secretary to Dr. Stewart
